Comments_List:
Many. 

(but seriously this course was particularly useful in just thinking about questions about the world in their relationship to marketing. Plus, I'll always remember the Coase conjecture).
General introduction/ a very good overview to theoretical modeling in marketing.
Both the course design (syllabus) and delivery of the material was well-organized and very helpful. Thank you for the great semester!
If I meet anybody who is interested in marketing theory, then I would completely recommend it - but I don't even have friends so I'm going to say this hypothetical situation is unlikely.
Yes, I would definitely recommend this course.
